name: Ludum Dare 38 - Alone
description:
In Alone you play...someone. Who has to do a thing. Honestly, I didn't think I'd get this far.

HTML5 version is untested, if you encounter issues, play the downloadable version instead.

Ludum Dare page available at LDJam.com (once publishing works)

Hints (spoiler warning)
  • There are two tables in the library.
  • The defences require power.
  • Tape isn't strong enough to hold levers, it's just not sticky enough.
  • That music sure is soothing.
Known bugs (to be fixed soon)
  • You need to face right to drop objects
